channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NJ

item.title: Report X-2024020937
item.description:
Report X-2024020937

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-28T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-05
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE ARRIVED AT THE HAZMAT CAGE, UPON INSPECTION 3 BOTTLES OF 70% ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL WAS FOUND MISSING. THE REMAINING ONE HAD NO DAMAGE IT WAS PLACE IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURN TO THE SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF 70% ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL CAUSED FROM THE PACKAGE BEING DROPPED OR MISHANDLED. DurationRel: 32 and MitigateEffect: CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION UNLESS OTHERWISE.

item.title: Report X-2024020932
item.description:
Report X-2024020932

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-28T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-05
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE ARRIVED AT THE HAZMAT CAGE, UPON INSPECTION THE PACKAGE WAS BOX WAS FOUND RIPPED AND 2 BOTTLES OF 4 ZEP CLOG ATTACK WAS FOUND TO BE MISSING. THE REAMINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURN TO SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF THE PACKAGE CAUSED FROM IT BEING DROPPED OR MISHANDLED. DurationRel: 32 and MitigateEffect: CONTENTS WERE PALACED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2024020939
item.description:
Report X-2024020939

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-28T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-05
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE ARRIVED AT THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEAKAGE. UPON INSPECTION PART B OF RAPICIDE WAS FOUND MISSING AND ONE BOTTLE OF PART A WAS FOUND TO BE SLIGHTY LEAKING. THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACE IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURN TO SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF RAPICIDE CAUSED FROM THE PACKAGE BEING DROPPED OR MISHANDLED. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALVAGE TO AWAIT DISPOSITION.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived at hazmat during sunrise sort in a plastic bin. DescribePack: Inspection showed package of "LABCHEM HYDROCHLORIC ACID" to be wet with internal leakage, torn, with 2 of 4 items broken. Damage most likely from being dropped or mishandled. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Remaining contents will be returned to shipper in a salvage drum, unless otherwise stated.

item.title: Report X-2024020959
item.description:
Report X-2024020959

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-27T18:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-06
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2024020959 SequenceEvent: Package arrived at the Hazmat cage during the Day Sort with signs of external damage due to internal leakage. Upon inspection of the package and its contents one of the four bottles was found without a cap. The remaining contents were placed in a salvage drum awaiting disposition. DescribePack: The package failure was due to a missing cap. Approximately 1/16 of the contents was leaked out of the package. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was immediately inspected and placed into a lined salvage drum to prevent any further leakage or damages. 2. X-2024020963 SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE ARRIVED AT THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEAKAGE. UPON INSPECTION ONE BOTTLE (PARTB) OF RAPICIDE WAS FOUND 1/2 WAY LEAKED OUT. THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURN TO SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF RAPICIDE CAUSED FROM THE PACKAGE BEING DROPPED OR MISHANDLED. DurationRel: 24 and MitigateEffect: CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2024020973
item.description:
Report X-2024020973

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-27T18:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-06
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE UNLOAD THE MANAGER NOTICED THE PACKAGE WAS WET AND IMMEDIATELY TOOK THE PACKAGE OVER TO THE HAZMAT CAGE TO SECURE IT AND VENTILATE IT PROPERLY. I THEN REPACKED IT IN A SMALL WHITE SALVAGE DRUM IN A TIMELY AND SAFE MANNER. DescribePack: APPROXIMATELY 1/2 CUP LEAKED FROM TWO OF THE FOUR BOTTLES INSIDE THE PACKAGE. A TOTAL OF 1 CUP OF DISINFECTANT LEAKED OUT DUE TO LOOSE CAPS. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: IMMEDIATELY TAKING THE PACKAGE OVER TO THE HAZMAT CAGE TO SECURE IT AND VENTILATE IT PROPERLY AND THEN HAVING ME REPACK IT INTO A WHITE SALVAGE DRUM IN A TIMELY AND SAFE MANNER.

item.title: Report X-2024020950
item.description:
Report X-2024020950

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-27T18:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-06
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE UNLOAD THE MANAGER NOTICED THE PACKAGE WAS WET AND ALSO THAT THE CLOSURES WERE TORN OPEN. THEY IMMEDICATELY TOOK THE PACKAGE TO THE HAZMAT CAGE TO SECURE IT AND VENTILATE IT PROPERLY. I WAS THEN NOTIFIED TO COME AND REPACK IT INTO A YELLOW SALVAGE DRUM IN A TIMELY AND SAFE MANNER. DescribePack: APPROXIMATELY 1 CUP OF RAPICIDE PART B LEAKED OUT OF ONE BOTTLE DUE TO IT HAVING A LOOSE CAP. THE OTHER 3 BOTTLES DID NOT HAVE ANY LEAKAGE. THEY JUST HAD THE LIQUID ALL OVER THEM FROM THE LEAKAGE THAT HAPPENED. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: IMMEDIATELY TAKING PACKAGE TO THE HAZMAT CAGE TO SECURE IT AND VENTILATE IT PROPERLY AND THEN CALLING ME OVER TO REPACK IT INTO A YELLOW SALVAGE DRUM IN A TIMELY AND SAFE MANNER.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Shipping box punctured while in transit causing four of four ReliaChem Smokehouse Cleaner 1Gal bottles to have loose caps. Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT Cage for further processing. DescribePack: Shipping box punctured while in transit causing four of four ReliaChem Smokehouse Cleaner 1Gal bottles to have loose caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately placed in RED Tote upon discovery and brought to HAZMAT Cage for further processing.

item.title: Report E-2024020466
item.description:
Report E-2024020466

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-26T15:11:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-13
  • City: BURLINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On February 13, 2024, one (1) 5-gallon pail of paint was damaged by a forklift and released approximately five (5) gallons of product to the dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from First Call Environmental (FCE) to remediate the impacted site. FCE personnel deployed granular absorbents to the paint-impacted dock and swept them in with hand tools. All spent absorbents were collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon drum. The damaged pail was collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon drum. Both containers were staged onsite for future disposal.

Upon discovery the package was placed in a red tote and secured in the hazmat cage DescribePack: Crack at the bottom of bottle DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Upon discovery was placed in red tote and secured in hazmat cage

item.title: Report X-2024020815
item.description:
Report X-2024020815

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-28T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-30
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: UPON INSPECTION IT WAS DISCOVERED ONE EVERSTART MAXX-59 BATTERY LEAKING AND WAS NOT PACKAGED CORRECTLY. DescribePack: THE BATTERY APPEARED TO BE LEAKING AND WAS IN THE PROCESS OF BEING RETURNED TO WALMART. THE BATTERY SHOULD NOT HAVE BEEN PICKED BY DRIVER WHEN IT WAS NOT PACKAGED CORRECTLY AND THEREFORE CAUSING THE PACKAGE LEAK. THE PACKAGE IS BOTH UNDECLARED AND UNPROCESSED. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: FACILITY PROCEDURES FOR DAMAGED HAZARDOUS MATERIAL FOLLOWED, CONTENTS CONTAINED AND AWAITING DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2024020763
item.description:
Report X-2024020763

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-27T18:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-30
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: UPON UNLOADING PACKAGE HANDLER NOTICED A WET BOX. NOTIFIED THE MANAGER. HAZMAT WAS PLACED IN A HAZMAT BAG AND HAZMAT TOTE WHERE IT WAS THEN TAKEN DOWN TO THE HAZMAT CAGE, WHERE IT WAS PROCESSED. DescribePack: THE BOX WAS WET WITH SOME INTERNAL LEAKAGE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE LID ON ONE OF THE PAILS INSIDE THE BOX WAS SLIGHTLY ASKEW AND SOME OF THE LIQUID FOR THE WIPES LEAKED OUT ONTO THE PAPER PACKING AND THE OUTER FIBREBOARD BOX.

item.title: Report X-2024020727
item.description:
Report X-2024020727

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-29
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ

  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE ARRIVE AT THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEAKAGE. UPON INSPECTION 2 BOTTLES OF NOBLE LOW TEMP SAN WAS FOUND AND THEY BOTH WERE BOTH SLIGHTLY LEAKING. THE CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINE SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURN TO THE SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF NOBLE LOW TEMP SAN CAUSED FROM THE PACKAGE BEING DROPPED OR MISHANDLED. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINE SALVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2024020722
item.description:
Report X-2024020722

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-26T15:11:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-29
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT THE HAZMAT CAGE, UPON INSPECTION THE BOX OF ZEP CLOG ATTACK WAS FOUND TO BE EMPTY. THE CONTENTS WERE MISSING HENCE THE BOX WAS PLACE IN THE HAZMAT CAGE IN A HAZMAT BAG TO BE SCRAPPED UNLESS OTHERS. DescribePack: FAILURE OF ZEP CLOG ATTACK CAUSED FROM THE PACKAGE BEING DROPPED OR MISHANDLED CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO BE MISSING. DurationRel: 24 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE BOX WAS PLACED IN THE HAZMAT CAGE INSIDE A CLEAR HAZMAT BAG TO AWAIT DISPOSITION UNLESS OTHERWISE.
